name: PapersGPT
description: PapersGPT is an advanced Zotero plugin that revolutionizes academic research by integrating DeepSeek's powerful language models alongside other AI systems (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Phi 4, Llama 3.2, Gemma, Mistral), enabling researchers to analyze papers, extract insights, generate summaries, and interact with complex scientific literature directly within their research workflowâ€”all while offering local processing options for enhanced privacy and data security.

content.overview: PapersGPT represents a significant advancement in AI-enhanced academic research, offering seamless integration with Zotero through a sophisticated plugin architecture that connects scholarly literature directly to multiple state-of-the-art language models, with special emphasis on DeepSeek's advanced capabilities. The platform transforms how researchers interact with scientific literature by creating an intuitive interface between complex research papers and DeepSeek's powerful semantic understanding, enabling natural language queries, comprehensive analysis, and insight extraction directly from PDFs within the familiar Zotero environment. By leveraging DeepSeek's specialized scientific knowledge and contextual understanding, PapersGPT dramatically accelerates the research process, helping scholars navigate technical literature, extract critical information, synthesize findings across multiple papers, and generate structured summaries that capture essential research insights. For privacy-conscious researchers, the platform offers local processing options that ensure sensitive research data remains secure while still benefiting from advanced AI analysis capabilities. This innovative bridge between scholarly content management and DeepSeek's language intelligence creates a powerful research companion that addresses key challenges in academic work including information overload, complex technical comprehension, efficient knowledge extraction, and research synthesis.

features.title: Advanced DeepSeek Model Integration
features.description: PapersGPT features comprehensive integration with DeepSeek's specialized language models including DeepSeek-R1 and DeepSeek-V3, optimized for scientific and academic content processing. The implementation leverages DeepSeek's exceptional abilities in understanding complex scientific concepts, technical terminology, and research methodologies, enabling more accurate and nuanced analysis of scholarly papers compared to general-purpose models. The integration includes specialized configurations that enhance DeepSeek's performance with different academic disciplines and publication types, from empirical studies to theoretical papers, literature reviews to technical reports. Researchers can select the appropriate DeepSeek model variation based on their specific research needs, benefiting from DeepSeek's ongoing advancements in scientific language understanding and knowledge extraction capabilities.

features.title: Multi-Model AI Ecosystem
features.description: Comprehensive support for various AI systems alongside DeepSeek, including ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Phi 4, Llama 3.2, Gemma, and Mistral, allowing researchers to select the optimal model for specific research tasks and content types

features.title: Intelligent PDF Analysis & Interaction
features.description: Advanced capabilities for direct interaction with research papers through natural language queries, enabling researchers to ask specific questions about methodologies, findings, implications, and technical details with context-aware responses generated by DeepSeek and other models

features.title: Seamless Zotero Integration
features.description: Native implementation within the Zotero research environment that preserves existing workflow while enhancing capabilities, maintaining all citation management and organization features while adding powerful AI-assisted analysis options

features.title: Local Processing & Privacy Protection
features.description: Comprehensive local processing options that download and run models directly on the researcher's machine, ensuring sensitive research data never leaves local storage while still benefiting from advanced AI capabilities through secure implementation

features.title: Research-Optimized RAG Architecture
features.description: Specialized Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with locally-built embeddings, vector database, and reranking capabilities that enhance model accuracy when analyzing scientific literature by providing relevant contextual information from the paper

useCases.title: Research Assistance
useCases.description: Summarize papers, identify key concepts, and quickly get answers to questions about research content

useCases.title: Literature Review
useCases.description: Generate insights and extract key information for literature reviews

useCases.title: Academic Writing
useCases.description: Get assistance understanding complex sections of papers and organizing research insights

useCases.title: Collaborative Research
useCases.description: Share annotated PDFs and AI-generated responses with colleagues and research teams

advantages: Integrates directly with Zotero for seamless workflow
Provides local model options for privacy-conscious users
Enhances research efficiency through AI assistance
Simplifies understanding of complex research papers
Works with existing research libraries in Zotero
Offers model flexibility for different research needs
Local RAG capabilities for enhanced privacy

faqs.question: How do I install PapersGPT?
faqs.answer: Download the papersgpt.xpi plugin file, open Zotero, go to Tools > Add-ons, click the gear icon, select 'Install Add-on From File', and open the downloaded plugin file.

faqs.question: How do I start using PapersGPT?
faqs.answer: After installation, open Zotero and press the keys to start the plugin (Command+Enter on MacOS, Ctrl+Enter on Windows). Open any PDF and start asking questions.

faqs.question: Which AI models are available?
faqs.answer: PapersGPT supports multiple models including DeepSeek-R1, DeepSeek-V3, various Gemini models, Phi-4, Llama3.2, QwQ-32B-Preview, Marco-o1, Gemma2, Mistral, ChatGPT-4o, and Claude models.

faqs.question: Is my data private when using PapersGPT?
faqs.answer: Yes, especially when using local models. For Mac users, models are downloaded, installed, and run locally, ensuring your data doesn't leave your machine. The RAG modules of embeddings, vector database, and rerank are all built and run locally.
